name: iot-quickstart-queue-to-db
description: Features a NodeJS application whose only purpose is to shovel data from specific RabbitMQ queues to the database.

scripts.start-local-peter: cross-env IOT_QUICKSTART_DB_HOST=localhost IOT_QUICKSTART_DB_PORT=5432 IOT_QUICKSTART_DB_USER=iotquickstartdba IOT_QUICKSTART_DB_PASSWORD=iotquickstart IOT_QUICKSTART_DB_SCHEMA=iotquickstartdb IOT_QUICKSTART_QUEUE_HOST=localhost IOT_QUICKSTART_QUEUE_PORT=5672 IOT_QUICKSTART_QUEUE_USER=guest IOT_QUICKSTART_QUEUE_PASSWORD=guest npm run start

author: Peter <peter.metz@unarin.com> (Somogyvari)
